#include <iostream>
#include "string.h"
#include "math.h"
using namespace std;
int unit(int n,int pow)
{
	int p[10][4]={{0,0,0,0},
			 {1,1,1,1},
			 {2,4,8,6},
			 {3,9,7,1},
			 {4,6,4,6},
			 {5,5,5,5},
			 {6,6,6,6},
			 {7,9,3,1},
			 {8,4,2,6},
			 {9,1,9,1}};
	n=n%10;
	while(pow>4)
	pow=pow-4;
	return p[n][pow-1];
}
int main()
{
	char ch[5];
	int n,count,i;
	int a[]={1,2,6,4,20,20,40,20,80};
	cin>>ch;
	while(*ch!='#')
	{
		n=0;
		count=strlen(ch)-1;
		for(i=0;i<strlen(ch);i++)
		n+=(*(ch+i)-48)*pow(10,count--);
		count=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(i<10)
				count+=unit(i,*(a+i-1));
			else
				count+=unit(i,4);	
			count=count%10;
		}
		cout<<count<<endl;
		cin.ignore();
		cin>>ch;
	}
	return 0;
}
